columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the client, a string value

columns.name: custFullNm
columns.description: Full name of the client, including company name

columns.name: sector
columns.description: Industry sector of the client, represented as a string

columns.name: financials.turnover
columns.description: Annual turnover of the client in numeric format, representing financial performance

columns.name: financials.currency
columns.description: Currency in which the client's financials are reported, as a standard currency code

columns.name: phone
columns.description: Phone number of the client, including area code and format

columns.name: meta.registered_on
columns.description: Date when the client was registered, in various date formats
